title: Billy

properties.name: description
properties.value: Billy is a Mountain goat who is found within the fencing of Tenzing's house.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Billy (goat)
Billy
Released9 August 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceGoat
LocationDeath Plateau,
North of Port Piscarilius
GenderMale
ExamineBilly is a baa-a-a-d goat.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID4116

Billy is a Mountain goat who is found within the fencing of Tenzing's house.

A second Billy was added to the game after the Great Kourend Rework update, located on a small island in the north-eastern corner of Great Kourend's Port Piscarilius.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
9 August 2004 –
5 December 2006 		5 December 2006 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • His name refers to the common nickname for male goats, "Billy goats."
